qna.question: My size 38 I will get 'm' it's comfortable for me?
This is lycra material?
qna.answer: No, but comfortable and soothing cotton mix

qna.question: Height 165 and weight 55 please tell the size
Colour quality jyega to nhi colour
When I choose brandes shirts i am choosing 40 size, in this case which size suite me perfect

qna.answer: Cotton is around 30-40 %, fabric is not good
